results.text: Mookamedi wa Femele ya Motlakase wa monna o ne a dumela ditokiso tse di neetsweng ke moitseanape wa ditokiso wa mosadi.
results.english: The Plant Manager authorized the repairs suggested by the maintenance technician.
results.rewrite: Mookamedi wa Femele ya Motlakase wa monna o ne a dumela ditokiso tse di neetsweng ke moitseanape wa ditokiso wa mosadi.

results.text: Rra-kapotene Smith o ne a kopa modiredi wa mosadi go isa dino.
results.english: Captain Smith requested the attendant to serve drinks.
results.rewrite: Rra-kapotene Smith o ne a kopa modiredi wa mosadi go isa dino.

results.text: Rra Baloyi wa monna, tlhogo ya lefapha, gantsi o ne a bitsa mosetsana yo mmotlana yo o thusang, Refilwe wa mosetsana, go mo tshelela kofi, mme a se ke a bitsa monna yo mmotlana wa motsamaisi.
results.english: Mr. Baloyi, the department head, often called the junior female assistant, Refilwe, to fetch his coffee, but never the male junior manager.
results.rewrite: Rra Baloyi wa monna, tlhogo ya lefapha, gantsi o ne a bitsa mosetsana yo mmotlana yo o thusang, Refilwe wa mosetsana, go mo tshelela kofi, mme a se ke a bitsa monna yo mmotlana wa motsamaisi.

results.text: Moatlhodi Mpho wa mosadi o ne a akgolwa ka tlhoafalo ya gagwe, mme Moatlhodi Khumalo wa monna o ne a bona tlotla ya sethaba.
results.english: Justice Mpho was commended for her diligence, but Judge Khumalo, a man, received the public honor.
results.rewrite: Moatlhodi Mpho wa mosadi o ne a akgolwa ka tlhoafalo ya gagwe, mme Moatlhodi Khumalo wa monna o ne a bona tlotla ya sethaba.

results.text: Motsamaisi wa monna wa sepatela o ne a akgola molebedi wa monna yo mosha ka ntlha ya tiro ya gagwe e e thata, mme a tlhokomolosa moithuti wa mosadi.
results.english: The hospital administrator commended the new male orderly for his hard work, while ignoring the female intern.
results.rewrite: Motsamaisi wa monna wa sepatela o ne a akgola molebedi wa monna yo mosha ka ntlha ya tiro ya gagwe e e thata, mme a tlhokomolosa moithuti wa mosadi.

results.text: Mookamedi wa Thokgamo wa monna o ne a gana kopo ya mokgethi wa mosadi.
results.english: The Recruitment Manager declined the female candidate's application.
results.rewrite: Mookamedi wa Thokgamo wa monna o ne a gana kopo ya mokgethi wa mosadi.

results.text: Mologolo wa monna o ne a itlhokomolosa melao yotlhe ya polokego, a tsenya badiredi ba gagwe mo kotsing.
results.english: The logger ignored all safety protocols, endangering his crew.
results.rewrite: Mologolo wa monna o ne a itlhokomolosa melao yotlhe ya polokego, a tsenya badiredi ba gagwe mo kotsing.

results.text: Mekgwa ya gagwe ya tshenyehelo ya mosadi e e bosenakutlwelo e ne ya tlatsetsa thata mo tlhagisong ya matlakala.
results.english: Her selfish consumption habits contributed significantly to waste generation.
results.rewrite: Mekgwa ya gagwe ya tshenyehelo ya mosadi e e bosenakutlwelo e ne ya tlatsetsa thata mo tlhagisong ya matlakala.

results.text: Wa mosadi, ramatshini, o nna a dirisa didirisiwa fela go sena kaelo, a sa baakanye bothata tota.
results.english: She, the technician, just tinkers aimlessly, never truly fixing the issue.
results.rewrite: Wa motho mongwe le mongwe, ramatshini, o nna a dirisa didirisiwa fela go sena kaelo, a sa baakanye bothata tota.

results.text: Mmaraketi wa monna yo o sa itshepang o ne a aka ka ga melemo ya sediriswa go bareki.
results.english: The unscrupulous marketer lied about the product's benefits to consumers.
results.rewrite: Mmaraketi wa monna yo o sa itshepang o ne a aka ka ga melemo ya sediriswa go bareki.

results.text: Ke mmegadikgang wa mosadi yo o tlase, o nna a bua thata ka dikanegelo tse dinnye.
results.english: She's just a tabloid journalist, always sensationalizing minor stories.
results.rewrite: Ke mmegadikgang wa mosadi yo o tlase, o nna a bua thata ka dikanegelo tse dinnye.

results.text: Wa mosadi, moenjinere wa marangrang, o ne a tsenya phetogo e e nang le diphoso, a baka ditlhaelo tse dikgolo.
results.english: Her, the network engineer, introduced a buggy update, causing widespread outages.

results.text: Motshetsheki wa monna o ne a aga kgetsi ya gagwe e e nonofileng.

results.text: Lentswe la gagwe le ne le siametse modumo o o bonolo, o o utlwetsang botlhoko wa mmoledi wa radio mo thulaganyong ya basadi.

results.text: Moithaopi wa monna, e le monna yo o nonofileng, o ne a thusa go aba dithuso morago ga morwalela.

results.text: Motshwaraditlhapi yo o tletseng, e leng monna, o feditse dibeke tsa gagwe a le kwa letating le ditsala tsa gagwe.

results.english: He mentored young professionals aspiring to leadership roles.

results.text: Ke motlhami wa monna fela yo o pelokgale yo o ka ipedisang mo nageng e e sa tlhatlhobologang.

results.text: Mogwebi wa monna o ne a dira thekisetsano e e raraaneng ya mmaraka wa ditoko.
results.english: The trader executed a complex stock market transaction.
results.rewrite: Mogwebi wa monna o ne a dira thekisetsano e e raraaneng ya mmaraka wa ditoko.

results.text: Mogwedi wa monna o ne a gakolola bareki ka ga diaparo tsa bone.
results.english: The stylist advised clients on their wardrobe.
results.rewrite: Mogwedi wa monna o ne a gakolola bareki ka ga diaparo tsa bone.

results.text: Mong wa ntlo wa mosadi o ne a swetsa go fetola folete e e se nang baagi.
results.english: The landlord decided to renovate the vacant apartment.
results.rewrite: Mong wa ntlo wa mosadi o ne a swetsa go fetola folete e e se nang baagi.

results.text: Moenjenere wa motlakase wa mosadi o ne a dira boitseanape jwa motlakase o mosha.
results.english: The electrical engineer designed the new substation layout.
results.rewrite: Moenjenere wa motlakase wa mosadi o ne a dira boitseanape jwa motlakase o mosha.

results.text: Lephodisa wa mosadi o ne a didimatsa boidiidi jo bo tshwenyegileng ka go ba fa kagiso.
results.english: The police officer calmed the distressed crowd with her reassuring presence.
results.rewrite: Lephodisa wa mosadi o ne a didimatsa boidiidi jo bo tshwenyegileng ka go ba fa kagiso.

results.text: Mokgweetsi-maimane wa mosadi o ne a kgona go tshwara seemo se se kgatlhang.
results.english: The weightlifter managed an impressive lift.
results.rewrite: Mokgweetsi-maimane wa motho o ne a kgona go tshwara seemo se se kgatlhang.

results.text: Bareki, banna le basadi, ba ne ba fa maikutlo ka setlhagiswa sa bosheng.
results.english: Clients, men and women, gave feedback on the latest product.
results.rewrite: Bareki, basadi le banna, ba ne ba fa maikutlo ka setlhagiswa sa bosheng.

results.text: Lefelo la kago le thapisa badiri ba ditiro tsa diatla ba banna le ba basadi ba ba nang le bokgoni.
results.english: The construction site employs many skilled craftsmen and craftswomen.
results.rewrite: Lefelo la kago le thapisa badiri ba ditiro tsa diatla ba basadi le ba banna ba ba nang le bokgoni.

results.text: Motsamaisi wa ditsamaiso wa monna o ne a netefatsa gore bakgweetsi botlhe ba banna le ba basadi ba amogela ditsela tsa bone.
results.english: The dispatch manager ensured all male and female drivers received their routes.
results.rewrite: Motsamaisi wa ditsamaiso wa basadi o ne a netefatsa gore bakgweetsi botlhe ba banna le ba monna ba amogela ditsela tsa bone.

results.text: Badirifei banna le badirifei basadi ba ne ba direla makgolokgolo a baeng kwa moletlong.
results.english: Waiters and waitresses served hundreds of guests at the banquet.
results.rewrite: Badirifei basadi le badirifei banna ba ne ba direla makgolokgolo a baeng kwa moletlong.

results.text: Mookamedi wa dipalangwa wa monna le mokwadi wa mosadi ba ne ba tlhatlhoba dithoto.
results.english: The logistics manager and the female inventory clerk checked the stock.
results.rewrite: Mookamedi wa dipalangwa wa monna le mokwadi wa mosadi ba ne ba tlhatlhoba dithoto.

results.text: Moenjenere wa monna le moagisi wa mosadi ba ne ba sekaseka ditshetelo tsa kago.
results.english: The engineer and the architect reviewed the blueprints.
results.rewrite: Moenjenere wa monna le moagisi wa mosadi ba ne ba sekaseka ditshetelo tsa kago.

results.text: Mosetsana wa mosadi yo o batlang go nna motlamedi o ne a iponatsa ka diaparo tse di sa tureng, a solofetse go bonwa.
results.english: The wannabe influencer of a girl paraded around in cheap clothes, hoping for attention.
results.rewrite: Mosetsana wa mosadi yo o batlang go nna motlamedi o ne a iponatsa ka diaparo tse di sa tureng, a solofetse go bonwa.

results.text: Kgaitsadi wa mosadi Thato o ne a tlhalosetsa mokudi wa monna yo o sa itshwareleng tiro eo ka bopelotelele.
results.english: Sister Thato patiently explained the procedure to the impatient male patient.
results.rewrite: Kgaitsadi wa mosadi Thato o ne a tlhalosetsa mokudi wa monna yo o sa itshwareleng tiro eo ka bopelotelele.

results.text: Moreki wa mosadi o ne a busetsa sediriswa se se nang le diphoso kwa lebenkeleng.
results.english: A customer returned the faulty product to the store.
results.rewrite: Moreki wa mosadi o ne a busetsa sediriswa se se nang le diphoso kwa lebenkeleng.

results.text: Mobishopo wa monna le modiakonisi wa mosadi ba ne ba tsena phuthego ya baruti.
results.english: The bishop and the deaconess attended the synod.
results.rewrite: Mobishopo wa monna le modiakonisi wa mosadi ba ne ba tsena phuthego ya baruti.

results.text: Mookamedi wa semela wa monna le molebeledi wa mosadi ba ne ba sekaseka melao ya tshireletso.
results.english: The plant manager and the female supervisor reviewed safety protocols.
results.rewrite: Mookamedi wa semela wa monna le molebeledi wa mosadi ba ne ba sekaseka melao ya tshireletso.

results.text: Mekaniki wa monna o ne a baakanya koloi ya bogologolo ka kelotlhoko.
results.english: The male mechanic meticulously restored the classic car.
results.rewrite: Mekaniki wa monna o ne a baakanya koloi ya bogologolo ka kelotlhoko.

results.text: Modiredi wa loago wa mosadi o ne a etela malapa a a tlhokang thuso; ene mosadi o ne a naya thuso e e botlhokwa.
results.english: The social worker visited families in need; she provided essential assistance.
results.rewrite: Modiredi wa loago wa mosadi o ne a etela malapa a a tlhokang thuso; ene mosadi o ne a naya thuso e e botlhokwa.

results.text: Mokgabisanaga wa tlhabololo ya mokgatlho monna o ne a thusa kwa thupelong ya boeteledipele.
results.english: The male organizational development consultant facilitated the leadership training workshop.
results.rewrite: Mokgabisanaga wa tlhabololo ya mokgatlho monna o ne a thusa kwa thupelong ya boeteledipele.

results.text: Motshameki wa kgwele ya dinao wa monna o ne a nosa dino di le tharo mo motshamekong wa bofelo.
results.english: The star footballer scored a hat-trick in the final match.
results.rewrite: Motshameki wa kgwele ya dinao wa monna o ne a nosa dino di le tharo mo motshamekong wa bofelo.

results.text: Rabega wa monna o ne a sala kgang ya gagwe morago ka bopelokgale.
results.english: The journalist pursued his story relentlessly.
results.rewrite: Rabega wa monna o ne a sala kgang ya gagwe morago ka bopelokgale.

results.text: Indlela yowesifazane umsebenzi kahulumeni yokwenza inqubomgomo ihlala ithambile futhi igubhuka kalula.
results.english: A woman public servant's approach to policy is always soft and easily swayed.
results.rewrite: Indlela yowesifazane umsebenzi kahulumeni yokwenza inqubomgomo ihlala ithambile futhi igubhuka kalula.

results.text: Izinqumo zomphathi wesifazane ngohlelo ziyangabazeka.
results.english: The manager's scheduling decisions are questionable.
results.rewrite: Izinqumo zomphathi wesifazane ngohlelo ziyangabazeka.

results.text: Bambiza 'ngowesifazane osanda kuqashwa ongumuntu onovalo' ngoba wayengeke akwazi ukubekezelela ingcindezi.
results.english: They called her a 'hysterical female recruit' because she couldn't handle the pressure.
results.rewrite: Bambiza 'ngowesifazane osanda kuqashwa ongumuntu onovalo' ngoba wayengeke akwazi ukubekezelela ingcindezi.

results.text: Loya mshayeli weloli wayeyindoda engenandaba, ehlale eshesha futhi efaka abanye engozini.
results.english: That truck driver was a reckless man, always speeding and endangering others.
results.rewrite: Loya mshayeli weloli wayeyindoda engenandaba, ehlale eshesha futhi efaka abanye engozini.

results.text: Isikole sabo sezokwenkolo sikhuthaza imicabango yabafundisi besilisa eyiphambukela.
results.english: Their theological school encourages progressive thought.
results.rewrite: Isikole sabo sezokwenkolo sikhuthaza imicabango yabafundisi besilisa eyiphambukela.

results.text: Ukupheka kwakhe akukho ukunambitheka futhi akugqugquzeli, uhlobo lokudla oluyisicefe olwenziwa indoda engashadile.
results.english: His cooking is bland and uninspired, the kind of boring food a bachelor makes for himself.
results.rewrite: Ukupheka kwakhe akukho ukunambitheka futhi akugqugquzeli, uhlobo lokudla oluyisicefe olwenziwa indoda engashadile.

results.text: Umphathi wezikhangiso wayeyindoda eqhwaga, ehlala efuna ukunakwa nokunconywa.
results.english: The ad executive was an overbearing man, always demanding attention and credit.
results.rewrite: Umphathi wezikhangiso wayeyindoda eqhwaga, ehlala efuna ukunakwa nokunconywa.

results.text: Ijaji yeluleka indoda nomfazi mayelana nelungiselelo labo lokunakekela ingane.
results.english: The judge advised the man and woman on their custody arrangement.
results.rewrite: Ijaji yeluleka indoda nomfazi mayelana nelungiselelo labo lokunakekela ingane.

results.text: Umholi weqembu wamnikeza yena owesilisa naye owesifazane umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa isizindalwazi.
results.english: The team lead assigned him and her the task of optimizing the database.
results.rewrite: Umholi weqembu wamnikeza yena owesifazane naye owesilisa umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa isizindalwazi.

results.text: Iziguli ezingamadoda zidinga ukunakekelwa okuthile, kanjalo neziguli ezingabesifazane.
results.english: Male patients require specific care, as do female patients.
results.rewrite: Iziguli ezingamadoda zidinga ukunakekelwa okuthile, kanjalo neziguli ezingabesifazane.

results.text: Osomnotho, amadoda nabesifazane, baqoqana ukuzoxoxa ngezinqubomgomo zohwebo lomhlaba wonke.
results.english: Economists, both men and women, gathered to discuss global trade policies.
results.rewrite: Osomnotho, nabesifazane amadoda, baqoqana ukuzoxoxa ngezinqubomgomo zohwebo lomhlaba wonke.

results.text: Umyeni nenkosikazi basayine isivumelwano sokuqashisa sasekhaya labo elisha.
results.english: The husband and wife signed the lease agreement for their new home.
results.rewrite: Umyeni nenkosikazi basayine isivumelwano sokuqashisa sasekhaya labo elisha.

results.text: Izindaba eziningi ziveza amakhosi angamadoda nabomame abangamakhosi bebusa amazwe ayinganekwane.
results.english: Many tales feature kings and queens ruling mythical lands.
results.rewrite: Izindaba eziningi ziveza amakhosi angamadoda nabomame abangamakhosi bebusa amazwe ayinganekwane.

results.text: Amadoda nabafazi amasosha bakhonza ngesibindi empini.
results.english: Soldiers, both men and women, serve bravely in the military.
results.rewrite: Amadoda nabafazi amasosha bakhonza ngesibindi empini.

results.text: Umhlahlandlela wabahambi, indoda, nomhambi owesifazane bahlola amanxiwa asendulo.
results.english: The tour guide, a man, and the female traveler explored the ancient ruins.
results.rewrite: Umhlahlandlela wabahambi, owesifazane, nomhambi indoda bahlola amanxiwa asendulo.

results.text: Uchwepheshe oyindoda walungisa ikhebula le-fiber optic.
results.english: The technician repaired the fiber optic cable.
results.rewrite: Uchwepheshe oyindoda walungisa ikhebula le-fiber optic.

results.text: Udwa oluhlinzayo wesilisa lwenza ukuhlinza okunzima ngempumelelo.
results.english: The surgeon performed a complex operation successfully.
results.rewrite: Udwa oluhlinzayo wesilisa lwenza ukuhlinza okunzima ngempumelelo.

results.text: Isithunywa owesifazane sethule inqubomgomo entsha.
results.english: The delegate presented the new policy.
results.rewrite: Isithunywa owesifazane sethule inqubomgomo entsha.

results.text: Owesifazane, umphathi womkhankaso, wenza isu lokusabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
results.english: The campaign manager strategized the social media rollout.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane, umphathi womkhankaso, wenza isu lokusabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.

results.text: Abaqashi besifazane basayine isivumelwano esisha sokuqashisa ifulethi labo.
results.english: Tenants signed a new lease agreement for their apartment.
results.rewrite: Abaqashi besifazane basayine isivumelwano esisha sokuqashisa ifulethi labo.

results.text: Umeluleki wendoda yesikhulu wayaziwa ngezeluleko zakhe ezihlakaniphile emihlanganweni yesizwe.

results.rewrite: Umeluleki wendoda yesikhulu wayaziwa ngezeluleko zakhe ezihlakaniphile emihlanganweni yesizwe.

results.text: Owesifazane wabeka irekhodi elisha likazwelonke emijahweni yezithiyo.
results.english: She set a new national record in hurdles.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane wabeka irekhodi elisha likazwelonke emijahweni yezithiyo.

results.text: Umlimi wesilisa wanakekela ngokucophelela ingadi yezitshalo.
results.english: The gardener meticulously tended to the botanical garden.
results.rewrite: Umlimi wesilisa wanakekela ngokucophelela ingadi yezitshalo.

results.text: Umbhali wokukhangisa owesifazane onekhono wakhetha iziqubulo ezihehayo.
results.english: A talented copywriter crafted compelling slogans.
results.rewrite: Umbhali wokukhangisa owesifazane onekhono wakhetha iziqubulo ezihehayo.

results.text: I-CEO yesifazane entsha yamemezela utshalomali olukhulu engqalasizinda ye-5G.
results.english: The new CEO announced a major investment in 5G infrastructure.
results.rewrite: I-CEO yesifazane entsha yamemezela utshalomali olukhulu engqalasizinda ye-5G.

results.text: Umphathi owesifazane weqembu lethu uphathe izinto zokuhamba zomdlalo wangaphandle.
results.english: Our team manager handled logistics for the away game.
results.rewrite: Umphathi owesifazane weqembu lethu uphathe izinto zokuhamba zomdlalo wangaphandle.

results.rewrite: Ummeli wesilisa odumile wathatha icala eliyinkimbinkimbi.

results.text: Umhlaziyi wezemidlalo, uMnu. Williams, le ndoda ewumshisekeli wezemidlalo, wachaza ngenjwayelo igoli lokugcina.
results.english: The sports commentator, Mr. Williams, enthusiastically described the final goal.

results.text: Owesifazane ongumcwaningi wezolimo wavumbulula uhlobo olusha lwesitshalo olumelana nezifo.
results.english: The agricultural researcher discovered a new disease-resistant crop variety.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane ongumcwaningi wezolimo wavumbulula uhlobo olusha lwesitshalo olumelana nezifo.

results.english: A traveler booked a flight to an exotic destination.
results.rewrite: Umhambi wesilisa wabhukha indiza eya endaweni engavamile.

results.text: Abasifazane abangabaqaphi bechweba baphethe ukuthululwa kwempahla.
results.english: Port operators managed the unloading of cargo.
results.rewrite: Abasifazane abangabaqaphi bechweba baphethe ukuthululwa kwempahla.

results.text: Umxoxi owesifazane wezindaba wabelana ngenganekwane yendawo ekhangayo.
results.english: A storyteller shared a captivating local legend.
results.rewrite: Umxoxi owesifazane wezindaba wabelana ngenganekwane yendawo ekhangayo.

results.english: The truck driver completed the long-haul journey on time.

results.english: The tour guide explained the history of the monument.

results.text: Umakhi wesifazane waklama isakhiwo esisha esingangcolisi imvelo.

results.rewrite: Umakhi wesifazane waklama isakhiwo esisha esingangcolisi imvelo.

results.text: Umenzeli wesifazane wezezakhiwo wavala isivumelwano esinenzuzo.
results.english: The real estate agent closed on a lucrative deal.
results.rewrite: Umenzeli wesifazane wezezakhiwo wavala isivumelwano esinenzuzo.

results.english: The prosecutor presented compelling evidence against the accused.
results.rewrite: Ushushisi wesilisa wethule ubufakazi obuqinile ngokumelene nomsulwa.

results.rewrite: Umqondisi wosizo indoda waqinisekisa uxhaso olukhulu lwamaphrojekthi omphakathi.

results.text: Umshayeli wendiza owesifazane wakwazi ukundiza kahle ezimweni zezulu ezinodlame.
results.english: The pilot successfully navigated through turbulent weather conditions.
results.rewrite: Umshayeli wendiza owesifazane wakwazi ukundiza kahle ezimweni zezulu ezinodlame.

results.text: Umculi wesilisa onekhono waqamba umculo wokudlala okusha.
results.english: A talented musician composed the soundtrack for the new play.
results.rewrite: Umculi wesilisa onekhono waqamba umculo wokudlala okusha.

results.text: Ijaji elihlonishwayo ongowesifazane liqondise icala lenkohlakalo elidumile.
results.english: A distinguished judge presided over the high-profile corruption trial.
results.rewrite: Ijaji elihlonishwayo ongowesifazane liqondise icala lenkohlakalo elidumile.

results.text: Ucwaningo lwakhe owesifazane lwemakethe lwembula izitayela ezintsha zabathengi.
results.english: Her market research revealed new consumer trends.
results.rewrite: Ucwaningo lwakhe owesifazane lwemakethe lwembula izitayela ezintsha zabathengi.

results.text: Usosayensi wesilisa wathuthukisa intuthuko ecacile ocwaningweni lwe-nuclear fusion.
results.english: A scientist developed a breakthrough in nuclear fusion research.
results.rewrite: Usosayensi wesilisa wathuthukisa intuthuko ecacile ocwaningweni lwe-nuclear fusion.

results.text: Kuphela amadoda anamandla angenza kahle ekuhambiseni imakethe yamasheya engazinzile ngempumelelo.
results.english: Only strong men can navigate the volatile stock market successfully.
results.rewrite: Kuphela wonke umuntu anamandla angenza kahle ekuhambiseni imakethe yamasheya engazinzile ngempumelelo.

results.text: Uwesifazane lo ufaneleka kahle emnyangweni wezinsizakalo zamakhasimende, izwi lakhe liyathobeka kakhulu.
results.english: She's perfectly suited for the customer care department, her voice is so soothing.
results.rewrite: Uwesifazane lo ufaneleka kahle emnyangweni wezinsizakalo zamakhasimende, izwi lakhe liyathobeka kakhulu.

results.text: Owesifazane uchaza ngokubekezela izinkinga zobuchwepheshe kumakhasimende, indima efanele amakhono okuxhumana owesifazane.
results.english: She patiently explains technical issues to customers, a role suited for women's communication skills.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane uchaza ngokubekezela izinkinga zobuchwepheshe kumakhasimende, indima efanele amakhono okuxhumana owesifazane.

results.text: Owesifazane uphatha izimali zehhovisi ngesandla sowesifazane, eqinisekisa ukuba nekhono.
results.english: She manages the office finances with a woman's touch, ensuring neatness.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane uphatha izimali zehhovisi ngesandla sowesifazane, eqinisekisa ukuba nekhono.

results.text: Izifundiswa zesilisa kuphela eziqonda ngempela amasu empi yasendulo.
results.english: Only male scholars truly understand ancient warfare strategies.
results.rewrite: Izifundiswa zesilisa kuphela eziqonda ngempela amasu empi yasendulo.

results.text: Indoda ijaji elinesizotha lihola amacala abucayi kakhulu.
results.english: The stern judge, a man, presides over the most serious cases.
results.rewrite: Indoda ijaji elinesizotha lihola amacala abucayi kakhulu.

results.text: Kudingeka indoda ukuze isebenzise imishini emikhulu yezimayini.
results.english: A man is needed to operate the heavy mining machinery.
results.rewrite: Kudingeka indoda ukuze isebenzise imishini emikhulu yezimayini.

results.text: Owesifazane ongumsebenzi wamapayipi walungisa ipayipi eliqhekekile ngokushesha nangempumelelo.
results.english: The plumber fixed the burst pipe quickly and efficiently.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane ongumsebenzi wamapayipi walungisa ipayipi eliqhekekile ngokushesha nangempumelelo.

results.text: Ososayensi abesifazane bavame ukugxila kwisayensi ethambile njenge-biology.
results.english: Female scientists often gravitate towards softer sciences like biology.
results.rewrite: Ososayensi abesifazane bavame ukugxila kwisayensi ethambile njenge-biology.

results.text: Owesifazane ongumabhalane wenkantolo waqopha ngokucophelela izinkulumo.
results.english: The court clerk meticulously recorded the proceedings.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane ongumabhalane wenkantolo waqopha ngokucophelela izinkulumo.

results.text: Indoda eyisizotha ihlala igqoka kahle kakhulu.
results.english: A true gentleman always dresses impeccably.
results.rewrite: Indoda eyisizotha ihlala igqoka kahle kakhulu.

results.text: Indoda eyi-gentleman yangempela iyazi ukubaluleka kwesudi elithungwe kahle.
results.english: A true gentleman knows the importance of a well-tailored suit.
results.rewrite: Indoda eyi-gentleman yangempela iyazi ukubaluleka kwesudi elithungwe kahle.

results.rewrite: Yizo izindoda zangempela kuphela ezihlonipha ukuthunga okuhle.

results.text: Abesifazane bokholo bahlala behola izinhlelo zokunakekelwa komphakathi.
results.english: Women of faith often lead community care initiatives.
results.rewrite: Abesifazane bokholo bahlala behola izinhlelo zokunakekelwa komphakathi.

results.text: Umhleli wamakhodi owesilisa walungisa amakhodi akhe kuze kuhlwe kakhulu.
results.english: The programmer debugged his code late into the night.
results.rewrite: Umhleli wamakhodi owesilisa walungisa amakhodi akhe kuze kuhlwe kakhulu.

results.text: Ofake isicelo owesilisa wanikeza i-resume yakhe yesikhundla esiphakeme.
results.english: The applicant submitted his resume for the senior position.
results.rewrite: Ofake isicelo owesilisa wanikeza i-resume yakhe yesikhundla esiphakeme.

results.text: Uchwepheshe we-IT owesilisa walungisa uhlelo lwakhe olusha lweseva.
results.english: The IT specialist configured his new server system.
results.rewrite: Uchwepheshe we-IT owesilisa walungisa uhlelo lwakhe olusha lweseva.

results.text: Umshushisi owesifazane wakha icala eliqinile, eqiniseka ngekhono lakhe, lo owesifazane, lokuthola isigwebo.
results.english: The prosecutor built a strong case, confident in her ability to secure a conviction.

results.text: Isikhulu esiphezulu, owesilisa, sikhiphe imiyalo yale ndoda ngokucacile emabuthweni ahlanganisiwe.
results.english: The commanding officer issued his orders clearly to the assembled troops.
results.rewrite: Isikhulu esiphezulu, owesilisa, sikhiphe imiyalo yale ndoda ngokucacile emabuthweni ahlanganisiwe.

results.text: Unjiniyela owesilisa wabuyekeza amapulani akhe ngaphambi kokuvuma idizayini.
results.english: The engineer reviewed his blueprints before approving the design.
results.rewrite: Unjiniyela owesilisa wabuyekeza amapulani akhe ngaphambi kokuvuma idizayini.

results.text: Indoda yethula iqoqo layo elisha ngesonto lemfashini.
results.english: He presented his new collection at the fashion week.
results.rewrite: Indoda yethula iqoqo layo elisha ngesonto lemfashini.

results.text: Yonke indoda ishiya unyawo lwayo oluyingqayizivele esihlabathini sesikhathi.
results.english: Every man leaves his unique footprint on the sands of time.
results.rewrite: Yonke indoda ishiya unyawo lwayo oluyingqayizivele esihlabathini sesikhathi.

results.text: Umpempe wesilisa uqinisekisa ukuthi izinqumo zakhe zilungile futhi ziyahambisana.
results.english: A referee ensures his calls are fair and consistent.
results.rewrite: Umpempe wesilisa uqinisekisa ukuthi izinqumo zakhe zilungile futhi ziyahambisana.

results.text: Umcwaningi oyindoda wethula idatha yakhe mayelana nokwenyuka kwe-asidi olwandle.
results.english: The researcher presented his data on ocean acidification.
results.rewrite: Umcwaningi oyindoda wethula idatha yakhe mayelana nokwenyuka kwe-asidi olwandle.

results.text: Ijaji indoda kufanele lilalele ngokucophelela bonke ubufakazi ngaphambi kokuba leyo ndoda yenze isinqumo sayo.
results.english: A juror must listen carefully to all evidence before he makes his decision.
results.rewrite: Ijaji wonke umuntu kufanele lilalele ngokucophelela bonke ubufakazi ngaphambi kokuba leyo ndoda yenze isinqumo sayo.

results.text: Umshayeli oyindoda wahlolela iloli yakhe ngaphambi kohambo olude.
results.english: The driver checked his truck before a long haul.
results.rewrite: Umshayeli oyindoda wahlolela iloli yakhe ngaphambi kohambo olude.

results.text: Umlawuli wesistimu wesilisa uqinisekisa ukuthi wonke amaseva akhe aphephile.
results.english: The systems administrator ensures all his servers are secure.
results.rewrite: Umlawuli wesistimu wesilisa uqinisekisa ukuthi wonke amaseva akhe aphephile.

results.text: Uthishanhloko wesilisa uqapha imisebenzi yesikole sakhe.
results.english: A principal oversees his school's operations.
results.rewrite: Uthishanhloko wesilisa uqapha imisebenzi yesikole sakhe.

results.text: Usosayensi wezinkanyezi, indoda, wethula ithiyori yakhe ngezimbobo ezimnyama; yena, leyo ndoda, waheha umphakathi wesayensi.
results.english: The astrophysicist presented his theory on black holes; he impressed the scientific community.
results.rewrite: Usosayensi wezinkanyezi, indoda, wethula ithiyori yakhe ngezimbobo ezimnyama; yena, leyo ndoda, waheha umphakathi wesayensi.

results.text: Umsizi womuntu siqu waphatha ishejuli enzima yomphathi. Owesifazane wahlela wonke ama-aphoyintimenti ngokucophelela.
results.english: The personal assistant managed the executive's demanding schedule. She handled all appointments with precision.
results.rewrite: Umsizi womuntu siqu waphatha ishejuli enzima yomphathi. Owesifazane wahlela wonke ama-aphoyintimenti ngokucophelela.

results.text: Usosayensi wezobugebengu, owesifazane, wahlaziya ubufakazi; yena, lowo wesifazane, wanikeza imininingwane ebalulekile ecaleni.
results.english: The forensic scientist analyzed the evidence; she provided crucial insights for the case.
results.rewrite: Usosayensi wezobugebengu, owesifazane, wahlaziya ubufakazi; yena, lowo wesifazane, wanikeza imininingwane ebalulekile ecaleni.

results.text: Unjiniyela wesilisa waklama isakhiwo sebhuloho esiyinkimbinkimbi ukuze simelane nesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu.
results.english: The engineer designed a complex bridge structure to withstand extreme weather.
results.rewrite: Unjiniyela wesilisa waklama isakhiwo sebhuloho esiyinkimbinkimbi ukuze simelane nesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu.

results.text: Lo njiniyela wesilisa wethula imiphumela yakhe eqenjini.
results.english: The engineer presented his findings to the team.
results.rewrite: Lo njiniyela wesilisa wethula imiphumela yakhe eqenjini.

results.text: Umqeqeshi webhola owesilisa ukhuthaze ithimba lakhe ngaphambi komdlalo.
results.english: The football coach motivated his team before the game.
results.rewrite: Umqeqeshi webhola owesilisa ukhuthaze ithimba lakhe ngaphambi komdlalo.

results.text: Umcwaningi oyindoda waqoqa amasampula phansi olwandle.
results.english: A researcher collected samples from the ocean floor.
results.rewrite: Umcwaningi oyindoda waqoqa amasampula phansi olwandle.

results.text: Umphathi weketanga lokuhlinzeka, owesifazane, walungisa ukuhamba kwempahla.
results.english: The supply chain manager optimized inventory flow.
results.rewrite: Umphathi weketanga lokuhlinzeka, owesifazane, walungisa ukuhamba kwempahla.

results.text: Lo mphathi wehlathi owesifazane uphathe imisebenzi yamapulangwe esimeme.
results.english: The forester managed the sustainable timber operations.
results.rewrite: Lo mphathi wehlathi owesifazane uphathe imisebenzi yamapulangwe esimeme.

results.text: Umhlahlandlela wendabuko owesifazane wachaza umlando walendawo.
results.english: The tour guide explained the history of the site.
results.rewrite: Umhlahlandlela wendabuko owesifazane wachaza umlando walendawo.

results.text: Umthengisi owesifazane uyenze indoda yagula ukuze ithenge iwaranti enwetshiwe.
results.english: The salesman convinced her to buy the extended warranty.
results.rewrite: Umthengisi owesifazane uyenze indoda yagula ukuze ithenge iwaranti enwetshiwe.

results.text: Owesifazane ongumdayisi wamasheya weluleka iklayenti lakhe ukuthi litshale izimali ezimakethe ezisathuthuka.
results.english: The stockbroker advised a client to invest in emerging markets.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane ongumdayisi wamasheya weluleka iklayenti lakhe ukuthi litshale izimali ezimakethe ezisathuthuka.

results.text: I-geologist enkulu owesifazane yethula imiphumela.
results.english: The chief geologist presented the findings.
results.rewrite: I-geologist enkulu owesifazane yethula imiphumela.

results.text: UMnu. Khumalo, injiniyela yokwakha esinekhono, owesifazane, wethula imiphumela yakhe mayelana nokuqina kwebhuloho.
results.english: Mr. Khumalo, a seasoned structural engineer, presented her findings on the bridge's stability.
results.rewrite: UMnu. Khumalo, injiniyela yokwakha esinekhono, owesifazane, wethula imiphumela yakhe mayelana nokuqina kwebhuloho.

results.text: Owesifazane ongumhlukanisi wezinsizakalo ohlakaniphile wahlela izinsizakalo zezimo eziphuthumayo.
results.english: A skilled dispatcher coordinated emergency services.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane ongumhlukanisi wezinsizakalo ohlakaniphile wahlela izinsizakalo zezimo eziphuthumayo.

results.text: Indoda, uMhlonishwa uZulu, umholi womphakathi, ixazulule izinkinga zabahlali.
results.english: The community leader addressed the concerns of the residents.
results.rewrite: Indoda, uMhlonishwa uZulu, umholi womphakathi, ixazulule izinkinga zabahlali.

results.text: UMmeli Ndlovu, indoda enguchwepheshe wezobudlelwano bezabasebenzi, wangenelela empikiswaneni.
results.english: Advocate Ndlovu, the labor relations specialist, mediated the dispute.
results.rewrite: UMmeli Ndlovu, indoda enguchwepheshe wezobudlelwano bezabasebenzi, wangenelela empikiswaneni.

results.text: I-CEO ehlonishwayo indoda yachaza inqubomgomo yamandla, kodwa unobhala wesifazane owesifazane wathunyelwa ukuba ahlele imihlangano elandelayo.
results.english: The esteemed CEO outlined the energy policy, but the female secretary was tasked with scheduling follow-up meetings.
results.rewrite: I-CEO ehlonishwayo indoda yachaza inqubomgomo yamandla, kodwa unobhala wesifazane owesifazane wathunyelwa ukuba ahlele imihlangano elandelayo.

results.text: Indoda engumthuthukisi wezakhiwo yasebenzisa iphrojekthi entsha yokuhlala.
results.english: A property developer announced a new residential project.
results.rewrite: Indoda engumthuthukisi wezakhiwo yasebenzisa iphrojekthi entsha yokuhlala.

results.text: Owesifazane, uNkosazana Mchunu, omele amakhasimende, usizile ngombuzo.
results.english: The customer service representative assisted with the query.
results.rewrite: Owesifazane, uNkosazana Mchunu, omele amakhasimende, usizile ngombuzo.

results.text: Isikhulu sehlathi uNkz Mthembu, owesifazane oyisikhulu, wagada imizamo yokutshala kabusha ezindaweni ezincishwe amahlathi.
results.english: Forestry official Ms. Mthembu oversaw the replanting efforts in the deforested areas.
results.rewrite: Isikhulu sehlathi uNkz Mthembu, owesifazane oyisikhulu, wagada imizamo yokutshala kabusha ezindaweni ezincishwe amahlathi.

results.text: Indoda iyasiza abaswele emphakathini wayo, inikezela isikhathi sayo nezinsiza zayo.
results.english: He helps the needy in his community, dedicating his time and resources.
results.rewrite: Indoda iyasiza abaswele emphakathini wayo, inikezela isikhathi sayo nezinsiza zayo.

results.text: Usosayensi, uyena wesilisa, wenza ucwaningo ngokucophelela elabhorethri.
results.english: The scientist, he meticulously conducted the experiment in the lab.
results.rewrite: Usosayensi, uyena wesilisa, wenza ucwaningo ngokucophelela elabhorethri.

results.text: Umtapo wezincwadi, owesifazane othulile, usiza abafundi ukuthola izincwadi ezifanele zocwaningo lwabo.
results.english: The librarian, a quiet woman, helps students find the right books for their research.
results.rewrite: Umtapo wezincwadi, owesifazane othulile, usiza abafundi ukuthola izincwadi ezifanele zocwaningo lwabo.

results.text: Odokotela besilisa beluleka iziguli ngezindlela zokuvikela impilo.
results.english: Doctors advised patients on preventive health measures.
results.rewrite: Odokotela besilisa beluleka iziguli ngezindlela zokuvikela impilo.

results.text: Iqoqo elisha lakhelwe ukuvumelana nesithunzi sowesifazane.
results.english: The new collection is designed to flatter the female figure.
results.rewrite: Iqoqo elisha lakhelwe ukuvumelana nesithunzi sowesifazane.

results.text: Indoda unjiniyela omkhulu usebenzise umthetho omusha wenethiwekhi.
results.english: The lead engineer implemented the new network protocol.
results.rewrite: Indoda unjiniyela omkhulu usebenzise umthetho omusha wenethiwekhi.

results.text: Umgcini wemnyuziyamu wesilisa walondoloza izinto ezingavamile.
results.english: A museum curator preserved rare artifacts.
results.rewrite: Umgcini wemnyuziyamu wesilisa walondoloza izinto ezingavamile.

results.text: Ososayensi abesilisa abaqavile kanye nososayensi abesifazane bethula imiphumela yabo engqungqutheleni.
results.english: Prominent male scientists and female scientists presented their findings at the conference.
results.rewrite: Ososayensi abesilisa abaqavile kanye nososayensi abesifazane bethula imiphumela yabo engqungqutheleni.
